name: Another Generic Dark Deception Fangame
description:
First person survival horror game inspired by Dark Deception by Glowstick Entertainment.

WHAT IS INCLUDED IN V1.0 (All of this is subject to change.)

-There are currently 8 levels but there may or may not exist more.

-Levels vary in difficulty but generally increase as you go along.

-There is no visible scoring system in this version although scores are being totaled.

-Due to the nature of this game, pausing during levels is strictly forbidden.

-Credits for certain aspects (BGMs, textures, mechanics, etc.) will be revealed as you progress.

CONTROLS

Same as Dark Deception: WASD to move. SPACE to toggle the minimap and Z to zoom. 1 and 2 to switch powers, Q and E to activate. Scroll to change teleport distance, LMB to teleport.

TRANSFERRING DATA

In the game folder find the file called [Game]/Saved/SaveGames/SaveSlot.sav. This is the save file for all your data. When you download a newer version of this game you can transfer the old save file into the corresponding location in the new one.

Feel free to contact me through Discord (WW92030#7524) if you have any issues.
